page.title: 08BUILTH (W): ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Many of the younger generation feel that there is not enough entertainment. There are discos on a Friday at Llanelwedd,just outside Builth;it costs about Â£1.50.On a Saturday evening discos are occasionally held at the Strand Hall, in the centre of town. A cinema is available at the 'Wyeside'Theatre,on the eastern side of town.As well as films being shown, pet shows are held as well as live music,poetry and plays. Older people go to the pubs,to bingo, or to "Country and Western" evenings, which are held monthly in the Greyhound Hotel. There is one pub outside the town, the Prince Llywelyn, at Cilmeri.
